title: No-Bake Chocolate Cookies
directions: Place all the ingredients in a food processor and pulse until it forms a dough.
Drop single tablespoonfuls of dough onto the working board and flatten the cookies.
Refrigerate the cookies for at least two hours before serving. Cookies can be kept in an airtight container in refrigerator for a week.
ingredients: 1 Â½ tsp virgin coconut oil, melted
